overview: Recorded live at Koseinenken Hall on July 31st, 1981, this performance captures the band in full flight while on tour promoting their Escape album. Features stunning live versions of 'Don't Stop Believin", 'Who's Crying Now', 'Lights', 'Wheel In The Sky', 'Any Way You Want It' and many more great classic tunes.
title: Journey: Live in Tokyo
